downfall:Aged.NAME: Aged
downfall:Aged.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, add a *Void to the top of your draw pile.

downfall:Bewildered.NAME: Bewildered
downfall:Bewildered.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When drawn, sneckomod:Muddle your hand, then Exhaust this.

downfall:Haunted.NAME: Haunted
downfall:Haunted.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Unplayable. NL When drawn, add Ethereal to all cards in your hand.

downfall:Malfunctioning.NAME: Flawed
downfall:Malfunctioning.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, transform all cards in hand into random Status cards. NL Exhaust.

downfall:Scatterbrained.NAME: Scatterbrained
downfall:Scatterbrained.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, if it is your turn, fill your hand with gremlin:Echoes of this card.

downfall:SummonMushrooms.NAME: Fungus Among Us
downfall:SummonMushrooms.DESCRIPTION: Kill all Mushrooms. Heal HP equal to their remaining HP. NL Summon two Mushrooms.

downfall:BossMaintenance.NAME: Maintenance
downfall:BossMaintenance.DESCRIPTION: *Strikes deal !M! more damage this combat. NL Gain !B! Dexterity. NL This costs 1 more this combat.
